alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 1:27PM PST until February 28 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Additional total snow accumulation of 3 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County and Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds and snow could bring down tree branches leading to power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 1500 to 3000 feet.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
